    def mail


    		
  

  

  

    
      16
    
    
      
        @email = Email.new(params[:contact_form])


    		
  

  

  

    
      17
    
    
      
        if @email.valid?


    		
  

  

  

    
      18
    
    
      
            Mailer.deliver_contact(@user, @email)


    		
  

  

  

    
      19
    
    
      
            flash[:notice] = l(:notice_contact_email_sent)


    		
  

  

  

    
      20
    
    
      
            if params[:id]


    		
  

  

  

    
      21
    
    
      
                redirect_to({ :controller => 'users', :action => 'show', :id => params[:id] })


    		
  

  

  

    
      22
    
    
      
            else


    		
  

  

  

    
      23
    
    
      
                redirect_to(:action => 'index')


    		
  

  

  

    
      24
    
    
      
            end


    		
  

  

  

    
      25
    
    
      
            return


    		
  

  

  

    
      26
    
    
      
        end

        render(:action => 'index')


    		
  

  

  

    
      28
    
    
      
    end

    def settings


    		
  

  

  

    
      36
    
    
      
        errors = []


    		
  

  

  

    
      37
    
    
      
        if params[:settings][:contact_us_enabled] &&


    		
  

  

  

    
      38
    
    
      
            params[:settings][:contact_us_title].blank? &&


    		
  

  

  

    
      39
    
    
      
            params[:settings][:contact_us_custom_title].blank?


    		
  

  

  

    
      40
    
    
      
            errors << l(:field_title) + ' ' + l('activerecord.errors.messages.blank')


    		
  

  

  

    
      41
    
    
      
        end


    		
  

  

  

    
      42
    
    
      
        if params[:settings][:contact_us_enabled] &&


    		
  

  

  

    
      43
    
    
      
            params[:settings][:contact_us_recipient].blank?


    		
  

  

  

    
      44
    
    
      
            if params[:settings][:contact_us_custom_email].blank?


    		
  

  

  

    
      45
    
    
      
                errors << l(:field_recipient) + ' ' + l('activerecord.errors.messages.blank')


    		
  

  

  

    
      46
    
    
      
            elsif !params[:settings][:contact_us_custom_email].match(/^([^@\s]+)@((?:[-a-z0-9]+\.)+[a-z]{2,})$/i)


    		
  

  

  

    
      47
    
    
      
                errors << l(:field_recipient) + ' ' + l('activerecord.errors.messages.invalid')


    		
  

  

  

    
      48
    
    
      
            end


    		
  

  

  

    
      49
    
    
      
        end


    		
  

  

  

    
      50
    
    
      
        if errors.count == 0


    		
  

  

  

    
      51
    
    
      
            Setting.plugin_contact_form_plugin = params[:settings]


    		
  

  

  

    
      52
    
    
      
            flash[:notice] = l(:notice_successful_update)


    		
  

  

  

    
      53
    
    
      
        else


    		
  

  

  

    
      54
    
    
      
            flash[:error] = errors.join('<br />')


    		
  

  

  

    
      55
    
    
      
        end


    		
  

  

  

    
      56

      57
    
    
      
    end

    def check_settings


    		
  

  

  

    
      66
    
    
      
        if params[:id]


    		
  

  

  

    
      67
    
    
      
            unless (Setting.users_contact_form? && @user.pref.contact_form) || User.current.admin?


    		
  

  

  

    
      68
    
    
      
                render_403


    		
  

  

  

    
      69
    
    
      
                return false


    		
  

  

  

    
      70
    
    
      
            end


    		
  

  

  

    
      71
    
    
      
        else


    		
  

  

  

    
      72

      73
    
    
      
                render_403


    		
  

  

  

    
      74
    
    
      
                return false

    def find_user


    		
  

  

  

    
      80
    
    
      
        if params[:id]


    		
  

  

  

    
      81
    
    
      
            @user = User.find(params[:id])


    		
  

  

  

    
      82
    
    
      
        else


    		
  

  

  

    
      83
    
    
      
            unless Setting.contact_us_recipient.blank?


    		
  

  

  

    
      84
    
    
      
                @user = User.find(Setting.contact_us_recipient)


    		
  

  

  

    
      85
    
    
      
            end


    		
  

  

  

    
      86
    
    
      
        end

    def find_projects


    		
  

  

  

    
      92
    
    
      
        if params[:id]


    		
  

  

  

    
      93
    
    
      
            @projects = (Project.visible.all & Project.all(:conditions => Project.allowed_to_condition(@user, :view_project))).sort


    		
  

  

  

    
      94
    
    
      
        else


    		
  

  

  

    
      95
